headline: Athene Announces Fourth Quarter 2025 Fixed Income Investor Call
summary: WEST DES MOINES, Iowa, Jan. 22, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Athene, a subsidiary of Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE: APO), announced it will host a Fixed Income Investor Call on Thursday, February 19, 2026, at 10:00AM ET. The call will feature members of Atheneâ€™s senior management team, who will provide an update on current business trends, new business origination, the investment portfolio, and capital. headline: Private-Credit Investors Are Cashing Out in Droves
summary: Redemptions by individual investors in the funds soared at the end of 2025 after performance declined, reviving questions about suitability.
